"But, my dear sir," said Nesvftski as he drew up, taking off his cap and smoothing his hair wet with perspiration with his plump hand, "wasn't I tellingyou to fire the bridge, when in- flammable material had been put in position?" 
"I am not your 'dear sir,' Mr. Staff Officer, and you did not tell me to burn the bridge 1 I know the service, and it is my habit orders strictly to obey. You said the bridge would
